strapiPost.title: Compton Gardens Receives Native Gardens Of Excellence Award
strapiPost.content:
The Missouri Prairie Foundation has awarded Compton Gardens and Arboretum with a Grow Native! Native Gardens of Excellence Award. 

  • Natural State: Compton Gardens is the first garden in the state to receive the Grow Native! award which is given to public gardens that have been maintained for over 3 years and consist of at least 90% native plants. 
  • Come enjoy: The garden is free to the public and welcomes all to enjoy the 7 acres of beautifully cultivated Ozark horticulture.

Plan your visit to Compton Gardens and Arboretum HERE.
